DOC.brief_summary: - To estimate dopamine receptor occupancy by aripiprazole using computer simulation - To measure dopamine receptor occupancy by aripiprazole in patients treated with the antipsychotics - To validate the simulation result by comparing the receptor occupancy from the simulation with that from the patients
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of schizophrenia treated with aripiprazole or risperidone no change in dose of antipsychotics for at least 6 weeks total PANSS score should be below 80 Other psychiatric disorders rather than schizophrenia history of head trauma positive in urine hCG on antidepressant, anticholinergics or mood stabilizer
